short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabber Keeper is a Chrome extension that allows you to save and restore your tabs and tab groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The UI is simple and intuitive. See all your open windows and tabs, and easily clean them up or suspend them for later.
